homepage.meta.description.message: Kordhin Thunderbird: Ku jawaab adigoo ku daraya lifaaqyadii asalka ahaa

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Ku dar lifaaqyadii asalka ahaa markaad ku jawaabayso Thunderbird — si toos ah ama kadib xaqiijin degdeg ah.

homepage.whatsNew.desc.message: Akhri isbeddelladii u dambeeyay ee ku jira {changelog}.

homepage.features.autoConfirm.title.message: Si Toos ah ama Xaqiiji Marka Hore

homepage.features.autoConfirm.body.message: Dooro u dhexeeya ku darid toos ah ama sanduuqa xaqiijinta ee yar oo leh gaabisyada kiiboodhka ee ku habboon.

homepage.features.dedupe.body.message: Waxay dhowrtaa lifaaqyada hore u jiray waxayna ka fogaataa nuqulo magac-fayl ahaan; nadiif ah oo la saadaalin karo.

homepage.features.skipSmime.body.message: Saxiixyada SMIME iyo sawirrada inline‑ka ayaa laga reebaa si jawaabaha ay u ahaadaan fudud.

homepage.features.blacklist.body.message: Qaabab glob oo aan kala eegin xarfaha waaweyn/yaryar, sida {code1} ama {code2}, ayaa ka hortaga in lagu daro faylal buuq leh.

homepage.search.tip.message: Talo: Riix {slash} ama {ctrl}+{k} si aad u raadiso dukumentiyada.

site.tagline.message: Kordhin Thunderbird: Ku jawaab adigoo ku daraya lifaaqyadii asalka ahaa
